reviewText: I liked this better then some other ones of his.  Each model went through essentially four poses.  Regular clothes, bathing suit, lingerie, and then naked.  Nothing vulgar, and some were more into it than others.  For some, they gave comments between takes, and before and after which made it a bit more personal.  Be nicer if it were less costly though....

If you buy this DVD for the basic premise of watching unsuspecting young ladys suddenly getting offered money to pose naked, you might get disappointed. This feels very staged, in a not-even-trying-very-hard-to-fool-us kind of way. So don't expect any of the participants to show any real signs of getting shocked over "how dare they do this to us innocent girls".

But still. The ten young women in this DVD are really pleasant to watch. They disrobe completely and then pose in front of the camera for a while, in a very tasteful way. Their bodies are mostly natural, both hair and th... sorry I mean here and there. I'm guessing this was shot in the mid-90's or so. The tempo is a bit slow, but that can of course be a good thing when you like what you see.

If you just want to see ten lovely ladies baring it all, in a nice and tasteful way, then this is 5 stars.
